content.prompt: Which of the following changes will lead to an increase in the supply of good X?

choices.label: An increase in the price of good X
An increase in the wages of labor used to produce good X
A decrease in the price of energy, a key input to the production of good X
An increase in the demand for good X
A decrease in the number of sellers of good X

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
